author: Dream Perfect
comment: You really need to calm down with the updates. Even if I'm a beta tester, 50 megabytes of update data daily is a lot. I know you want to improve your app but right now the best way for you to do that is to reduce data usage. Otherwise your consumers will go to other platforms that uses less data.

author: Brian Wort
comment: It is great to keep in contact with friends and family

author: Crystal Glory
comment: I like Messenger but there is only 2 problems: during video calling, I can't make my camera bigger whenever I like, it's way too small to see! It's not like Whatsapp video calling where you can make your camera bigger to see your own face big if you want. Also, please add better & realistic filters with better color quality like on instagram. 😆 Please fix this feature & make it like Whatsapp! Thanks!

author: Paul Favot
comment: Good application, but the latest updates have taken the option to sign out away. The application constantly wants to take over the default SMS . Not sure how workable all the options are on a Australia network. As most applications are created and tested in other countries. Sadly we find that the local network can not accommodate these new options or updates due to network types.

author: Jonathan Ventura
comment: The app is pretty good. It's well organized and works pretty smoothly. I'm glad you can put it in your SD card, if you don't have it pre-installed in your phone. Customizable, too. Only apparent flaw is the poor camera quality. It doesn't receive light as well as the phone's camera.

author: Jordy13 Xoxo
comment: It's an okay app, takes up so much space though, so iam always deleting and redown loading. Also what do you keep updating doe? Please fix the storage problem Or at least just let us message from Facebook  Edit: It keeps saying I'm not connected to Wi-Fi when I am. Fix this

author: china david
comment: Concur with those who complained before me. The app is big, takes too much space. Uses too much data and it's really unnecessary to first install Facebook @ 500mb and then install messenger which is part of Facebook at 300mb. It's really doesn't make sense unless this was done deliberately to scam users. I am sure you would note this feedback and create another app with both FB and messenger with a smaller interface for vigilantes like myself

author: Clarise Gindap
comment: I really like messenger because it is much convient that other communication apps but what I really dont like is the updates cuz it occupies too much memory of my phone. Like every other week it has to be updated... You really need to calm down in updating this app though instead of a help it cause inconvenience to the user.

author: Jasiemiel Reyes
comment: I highly appreciate it because of i can send free messages esp in times of emergency! Keep it up! My concern is that there are times that it deletes the messages by itself! Please my messages are very important to me. And how can i back up the messages? Thanks and God bless! :)  Pls. Some of my messages from my contacts have been deleted by its own. I already changed my password and put some app locks still the messages are being deleted by its own.

author: doit toit
comment: Too invasive.  Cannot silence or ignore calls, cannot delete multiple old messages instead you must open each message one by one to delete.  If you don't want to talk to the person calling, don't get back on messenger because it notifies them to call again cause you're back online.

author: Andrea Manuel
comment: So far this messenger app is pretty useful.. I just one have concern, i really dont like the AD  popping on my messenger app.. Can u pls tell me how to get rid of it? I hide the AD already but it keeps coming back .thank you ang more power to the creator of this app. God bless

author: Jerry Xiong
comment: Okay there are alot of things that is happening. First, sometimes when I'm messaging someone, and two out of the message the bubble will disappear and I will have to go into the app and see if the bubble will show up, nope. I have to go into settings and force it to stop to get it to work properly again. Second, the camera. It will be sideways and be zoom up really close. Third, the video quality is really bad. Very choppy.

author: Glenn Sharp
comment: I use this app. A lot glad to have it although it could probably use an update. You know what I can see is that when I decide to change my code or my email you automatically decided that you chandelier it to what you want them it takes hours  to get back into my account this is not what I call privacy policy terms  maybe that's why there are so many accounts open. I've been having a lot of people who are hacking my account on account of this I'm just about to shut Facebook out of my life completely on account of all this

author: Monique B.
comment: Like the calls and video calls but New update on 2/27 took the availability button off WHY???? I don't want to be shown online in the middle of the night and STILL NO LOG OUT FUNCTION LIKE THE FACEBOOK APP HAS... add this and I'll be more than happy to increase my rating for this messenger app that i use quite frequently

author: A Google User
comment: USELESS UPDATES!  PLEASE STOP developing STUPID, MEANINGLESS add-on for the Facebook and Messenger App!   PLEASE patch the Messanger PROPERLY! Correct the crashing bug. Remove Call History and Video Chat.  Develop a new app focused around those two aspects.   There's too much code unraveling every week, then y'all put a temporary patch and ADD something useless.

author: Sheila Hurt
comment: I like this app more than other apps I've tried in the past, and wind up deleting them because of adds!! This App doesn't have any unwanted adds and I enjoy using my messenger to stay in touch with family and friends!!
title: Pretty good App so far!!

author: styx-nz
comment: Intrusive and unnecessary. If i can message within facebook on a pc, why do i need this on my phone? And why do i still get notifications when they are supposed to be off? And why do i have to go deep into settings to make sure the damn thing turns off? Very unhappy that i am essentially forced to install this p.o.s. app.

author: Alex PR
comment: Every update gets me worried about new bugs introduced. Now, despite expected seamless integration with Facebook, every time I open messenger through Facebook, it takes me to GooglePlay, which is nonsense. GUI is not user friendly and transparent. I may continue the list of annoyances...

author: Niño Dan Mercado
comment: All good but can you make the app like the one apple has, whereby the person I'm calling or speaking with do not hear my phone's sounds? It's annoying trying to watch a funny video and the other person hears two sounds. Thank you

author: Emily-Jayne Irksen
comment: I have had problems with this since I got it. Its been uninstalled and ill never have it back again. Chat heads glitch or dont work at all. Messages dont load. Videos have never loaded. Having Facebook and messenger separate is a waste of time and a waste of memory/space on your phone. it is ridiculous how much memory they have..... There is an app 'messenger for facebook' (lite MSF) that has them combined. It is much better and hardly takes up memory on your phone! Highly recommend that instead! You can see messsges, newsfeed. and other important stuff from this!

author: Robert Zabulonian
comment: Since Android 8.0 the option to add chat head shortcuts to my screen has been missing.  This is a very important issue to me, and I have seen reports of it from as early on as November of last year, yet there is still no fix.

author: Jasmine Rodriguez
comment: I recently got the the new phone S8 Active. Every time I send out a GIF to a friend. It doesn't show on my end it just says  'share' . So I can't see what I was sending. What if I send the wrong one? That's not very  convenient  for ME or the other person. Please fix. My phone is way to new to not work properly

author: Allison Lee
comment: I  HATE THE NEW UPDATE! I DON'T WANT TO SEE THE STUPID "MY DAYS" HERE ALSO, I'M ALREADY SICK OF SEEING IT ON FB. PLEASE TELL ME HOW I CAN JUST UNINSTALL THIS LATEST UPDATE! PLEASE 😭

author: Yolanda Thomas
comment: Messenger is not a bad app. It just consumes so much space on your device. I would be nice if you could transfer the app to your SD card instead of placing it in the device storage. That in itself would definitely receive ⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤  3-1-18 So I'm so happy to change my stars for this app. They fixed it where you can move the app to your SD card. Thank you so much!!!

author: Julie Shelley
comment: Aweful app !! You send messages to people without users consent. You've created unnecessary problems because you've sent messages to people without their consent. I don't want to ever use your app again. You should be banned from having a website because you can't control what is going on. F- is what I give you.

author: Mitica Pojoga
comment: Why do you have to monopolize Facebook and messenger?  Why do you block me for a comment that is not politically correct, but is real in this life. .  You block me one more time, you are out of my life, because you suck anyway!

author: Jam Alemania
comment: Pleeeaaaseee minimize in upgrading if still it cannot fix others problems with this apps. It consumed a lot of space. Not all are blessed to have a phone that contain more of storage. Thankyou! God Bless

author: Susan Montey
comment: The app keeps turning my notifications off by itself and won't let me turn them back on. It did it to me on 2 different phones now and when I cluck to turn back on it tells me the app doesn't exist but yet I'm using it???

author: jeyomar vasquez
comment: I can't see my GF's My Day and it is really frustrating... Same goes to her she can't see my my day. Fix this and i will give 5 star. Been dealing with this problem since last year but i can't this anymore.

author: Stacy Hubbert
comment: My only complaint is that I have been trying to unblock someone everyday for the last two weeks. After I unblock someone and back out, they are instantly back on the block list. I've sent in a problem report every single day and I've heard nothing back.

author: Jayniel Dano
comment: It is so annoying. I uninstalled and installed it already so that whenever I made called my cellphone turned black the screen. I do it 4x already. Plus the liker emoticon on every msgs is super annoying. Even if you don't want to tap it, they'd tapped. I hope you have personal option on it to turned it on and off. It's ok to innovated the app but if the innovation is so awful and make it hassle to the part of consumer mind as well removed that liker. We don't want to frustrate the one that we chat just because we accidentally tap the sad emoticon.

author: Tim Peter
comment: I really like the app. It's easy & convenient. Yet I agree with others that it's redundant & unnecessary when the regular FB can & should include this. The separate app definitely takes up too much valuable memory in my phone that could be used for other apps.

author: Chris Hauk
comment: Why change the screen format!  Unbelievable don't need all that see all! . to much wasted screen usage! Now Shared Days taking  bad user design UL development eating bon bons & drinking to much MD. Glitches bugs

author: Anton Hofstede
comment: That extension button got stuck on my screen, even after restarting my phone. I couldn't even uninstall messenger because the I couldn't select "yes" to the "are you sure you want to uninstall" question, I tried uninstalling multiple ways, every possibly way you can, none worked. Honestly, I'm considering using another way to keep in touch with my girlfriend, texting isn't instant, but I refuse to deal with this and I already don't trust Facebook. I wouldn't have even been able to reset my entire phone because I wouldn't have been able to select "yes" when trying to do it. This app is becoming absolute junk. No one cares about half the bloat you put on it, it's just more useless stuff.

author: Shahariar Akram Nokib
comment: You give updates so often but don't improve much. I'm seeing "Now you can see your call history and missed calls" in "what's new" option for several months. 😒 So why are you keep giving updates so often without doing any new things!???

author: Ace Hernandez
comment: I recently just updated the app again. Despite that, it still keeps on crashing. I don't know why but when I'm using my account on it, it just keeps on doing so. I doesn't happen when other accounts are logged in on the app. Please fix

author: Christopher Sharp
comment: I don't know what you a-holes did, but one day the "My Day" b.s. is working just fine then suddenly nothing. I did everything from sharing through the app to re-installing to restarting my phone. I sent a report, but I don't expect too much considering the last time I did, it was to make y'all aware that my cousin's Facebook had me taken over by a stranger!! That was October and here we are in March. That person still occupies her name, but with a different face. Also, your calls keep dropping. Its all jacked up. Are you guys trying to lose people?!?

author: Dylan Gunter
comment: I run FB on my chrome browser and I was forced to download this app just so i could see the messages people had sent me. I do not use the facebook app because I do not agree with Mark zuckerberg and his downright authoritarian censorship. I was banned for 30 says for stating a opinion, a mild one at that, and there is absolutely no way to appeal. I do not recommend this app at all. Find alternatives if you can, such as discord or Skype.

author: Lynn G
comment: The last time I installed messenger on my phone it's been a mess. It keeps downloading over 400 stickers into my gallery and I can't get it to stop.  How do I fix this and stop this from happening?? If you fix this you'll get a 5 star  rating again

I deleted my conversations with my friend. And i notice shared photos doesnt deleted . Shared photos was there. Please kindly fix this issues that if i ever delete any conversation shared photo must be deleted too. Its annoying that it doesnt delete.
